alert.note: Alert for City of Roanoke; City of Salem; Roanoke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:59PM EST until January 10 at 10:30PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting Roanoke, City of Salem and City of Roanoke independent cities. Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Halifax and Charlotte Counties. For the Roanoke River...including for Roanoke and for Randolph... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke River at Roanoke. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Flooding occurs in portions of Wasena Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:35 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 3.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EST.

area.areaDesc: City of Roanoke; City of Salem; Roanoke
